languages.text: "Я веду, {name}". {n}Голос Маражая теряет флер неторопливой небрежности — он явно не хочет упускать возможность поговорить с собратьями.{/n} "Они здесь — ради меня. И я хочу с ними говорить. Пропусти их на свой корабль".

traits.locale_text: "Я веду, {name}". {n}Голос Маражая теряет флер неторопливой небрежности — он явно не хочет упускать возможность поговорить с собратьями.{/n} "Они здесь — ради меня. И я хочу с ними говорить. Пропусти их на свой корабль".

languages.text: "But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."
languages.original_text: "Я веду, {name}". {n}Голос Маражая теряет флер неторопливой небрежности — он явно не хочет упускать возможность поговорить с собратьями.{/n} "Они здесь — ради меня. И я хочу с ними говорить. Пропусти их на свой корабль".

traits.locale_text: "But I do, {name}". {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried carelessness, he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kinsmen.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them into your vessel."

"But I do, {name}". {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried carelessness, he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kinsmen.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them into your vessel."

"But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

"But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

"But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

languages.text: "Ich aber, {name}." {n}Marazhais Stimme verliert ihren Anstrich des gelassenen Gleichmuts — er will sich offenbar die Gelegenheit nicht entgehen lassen, mit seinen Verwandten zu sprechen.{/n} "Sie sind meinetwegen hier. Und ich will sie anhören. Lasst sie auf Euer Schiff."
languages.original_text: "But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Ich aber, {name}." {n}Marazhais Stimme verliert ihren Anstrich des gelassenen Gleichmuts — er will sich offenbar die Gelegenheit nicht entgehen lassen, mit seinen Verwandten zu sprechen.{/n} "Sie sind meinetwegen hier. Und ich will sie anhören. Lasst sie auf Euer Schiff."

languages.text: “但我想，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋的声音里没有了往日的漫不经心。显然，他不想错失和族人交谈的机会。{/n}“他们是来这里找我的，我想听听他们怎么说。让他们上你的船吧。”
languages.original_text: "But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

traits.locale_text: “但我想，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋的声音里没有了往日的漫不经心。显然，他不想错失和族人交谈的机会。{/n}“他们是来这里找我的，我想听听他们怎么说。让他们上你的船吧。”

languages.text: « Mais moi, si, {name}. » {n}La voix de Marazhai, jusque-là d'une langueur nonchalante, se durcit, trahissant sa volonté de parler aux siens.{/n} « Ils sont là pour moi. Et j'ai bien l'intention d'écouter ce qu'ils ont à me dire. Laissez-les monter à bord. »
languages.original_text: "But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

traits.locale_text: « Mais moi, si, {name}. » {n}La voix de Marazhai, jusque-là d'une langueur nonchalante, se durcit, trahissant sa volonté de parler aux siens.{/n} « Ils sont là pour moi. Et j'ai bien l'intention d'écouter ce qu'ils ont à me dire. Laissez-les monter à bord. »

languages.text: «Pero yo sí, {name}». {n}La voz de Marazhai pierde su fingido desinterés. Evidentemente, no quiere dejar pasar la ocasión de hablar con su gente.{/n} «Han venido aquí por mí. Y quiero escucharles. Deja que suban a tu nave».
languages.original_text: "But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Pero yo sí, {name}». {n}La voz de Marazhai pierde su fingido desinterés. Evidentemente, no quiere dejar pasar la ocasión de hablar con su gente.{/n} «Han venido aquí por mí. Y quiero escucharles. Deja que suban a tu nave».

languages.text: 「だが俺はやるぜ、{name}」{n}マラズハイの声は冷静沈着な装いを失いつつある。同族と話すチャンスを逃すまいとしているは明らかだ。{/n}「奴らは俺様を追ってここに来たんだ。奴らの言い分を聞いてみたい。お前の船に乗せてやれよ」
languages.original_text: "But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「だが俺はやるぜ、{name}」{n}マラズハイの声は冷静沈着な装いを失いつつある。同族と話すチャンスを逃すまいとしているは明らかだ。{/n}「奴らは俺様を追ってここに来たんだ。奴らの言い分を聞いてみたい。お前の船に乗せてやれよ」

languages.text: "Ben yaparım ama {name}." {n}Marazhai'ın sesindeki sahte rahatlık ve soğukkanlılık kayboluyor. Türüyle konuşma şansını kaçırmak istemediği belli.{/n} "Buraya benim için geldiler, ben de onları dinlemek istiyorum. Gemine al şunları."
languages.original_text: "But I do, {name}." {n}Marazhai's voice loses its veneer of unhurried nonchalance — he clearly does not want to miss the chance to talk to his kin.{/n} "They are here for me. And I wish to hear them out. Let them onto your vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Ben yaparım ama {name}." {n}Marazhai'ın sesindeki sahte rahatlık ve soğukkanlılık kayboluyor. Türüyle konuşma şansını kaçırmak istemediği belli.{/n} "Buraya benim için geldiler ve ben de onları dinlemek istiyorum. Gemine girmelerine izin ver."
